name: iPowerless
description:
The robot i is in trouble! He has to get back home to earth to report his findings in his journey but he has ran out of time! Can you help guide him through various sanctuaries created by space civilizations for his journey?

A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39 compo. 

WASD movement is used, and abilities can be gained throughout the game. Left click to shoot.

Game is not necessarily full, if you have any comments or want me to complete it please let me know.
